mapper.select: SELECT c.id ,c.author_id AS authorId, c.content, c.time, c.vote_count AS voteCount, c.replay_id AS replayId,u.name AS authorName,u.photo_url AS authorPhoto,u.home_url AS authorUrl FROM COMMENT c,USER u WHERE c.author_id = u.id and c.answer_id = #{id} order by c.time
select count(*) from COMMENT WHERE answer_id = #{id}
